title: VH1 new desigb
content:
Hi, does anybody know which company created the new VH1 logo design??? im dying to find out!

PLEASE HELP!

 [‹ Information Design, information architecture](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121231929/http:/typophile.com/node/12268 "Go to previous forum topic") [Compacta Serif? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121231929/http:/typophile.com/node/14059 "Go to next forum topic")
author: shirly

comments.content:
Oops, that’s not correct.

WWFT did the motion graphcs on the channel bumpers (station identification animations between shows). The logo was designed by Nancy Mazzei, who was (is?) at VH1.

If you are extremely bored, here’s an exhaustive (in the physical sense) thread on the subject:

[http://www.underconsideration.com/speakup/archives/001579.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121231929/http:/www.underconsideration.com/speakup/archives/001579.html "http://www.underconsideration.com/speakup/archives/001579.html")
